reviewText: Although the presenter made some interesting points, the presentation was devoid of [facts] and long on religious dogma or petitions to a return to religion/reliance on God.

As a financial advisor and Christian, I find this perspective to be fascinating and eye-opening.  They certainly don't teach this view in our secular schools. Jerry Bowyer has other presentations that talk about the economic performance of countries that are God-centered vs not and their ultimate fate.
I found this DVD to be very enlightening and thought provoking!  Thank you, Mr. Bowyer for a very informative DVD.

Making sense out of the vagaries and vasilations of economics is tough at any point but Jerry Bowyer's concise reasoning is a breath of fresh air. For those who hope to see economic policy designed toward a sensible and positive result instead of one monetary train wreck after another will find this treatment very helpful.
